content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Salary and Paydays\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Base pay of 200 USD (converted in UAH) is paid on 5\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" day of the month following the month of cooperation. The bonus part (in case of project assignment) is paid on the 15\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" day of the month following the month of cooperation. Compensation is paid on the last working day before the date if it falls on a weekend or holiday.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If base pay is paid for the last month in a quarter (March, June, September, December), the payment is made \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"on the last business day of this month\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your salary depends on hours worked, so \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"if you work part-time the amount will be reduced proportionally\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You may address your questions on salary and compensation scheme to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAnywhereSalary@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Salary\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Paid time off days\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM offers 25 working paid time off days per year for you. You can use them for any reason either to replenish your energy or recover while sickness. The company allows you to split your PTO days into shorter periods, calculated in working days and even hours.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please mind that these days are available after probation is successfully passed, and accrued prorated to the worked period. You are to use all of them by the year-end with no possibility to extend the deadline.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For more details, please review the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMPLXPUB/UA+vacation+flow\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Anywhere FAQ\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember that for any type of leave you need to create a vacation request at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/epm-vts-web/dashboard\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"vacation.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Google Chrome is the only supported browser). For more information see the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMVTSPUB/VACATION+User+Help\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMVTSPUB/Original+UI\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacation User Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions, please address them to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAnywherePeople@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere People\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or your People Partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Benefits\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we place great value on employee satisfaction and provide our employees with the best possible conditions to work productively and in a comfortable atmosphere.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We offer a wide range of perks and benefits designed to help you feel well. The well-being of our employees makes our success possible!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Since the package differs from country to country, please review the typical benefits suite in your location in the deck:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":1480386,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/99efc9fc-8606-4188-a53d-61dc851248a7/Benefits_Onboarding_FL_2021.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/99efc9fc-8606-4188-a53d-61dc851248a7/Benefits_Onboarding_FL_2021.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Benefits_Onboarding_FL_2021.pdf\",\"name\":\"Benefits_Onboarding_FL_2021.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"99efc9fc-8606-4188-a53d-61dc851248a7\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions about benefits, please address them to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAnywherePeople@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere People\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or your People Partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
